# Haste, Swift (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1d4 rounds

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 110

*Two quick syllables release the power of the spell, and the world moves a bit slower about you.*

This spell functions like *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*, except as noted above. This spell counters and dispels any *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]* effect on you.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level.
